name: Hyper Furball
description:
Hyper Furball v1.05
by DDRKirby(ISQ) and Kat Jia
Japanese Translation by A-zu-ra

Soundtrack download

Hyper Furball was made in 72 hours for round 27 of Ludum Dare. The theme was "10 Seconds", so we made a zany side-scrolling RPG about a beloved Furball who turns HYPER when he finds milk. This one is packed with pure fun! It's also the first Ludum Dare entry where we started to really find our footing.

Awards (out of 776 jam entries):

  • #1 in Audio
  • #2 in Fun
  • #4 in Overall

Current world records:
Normal Mode, no continues - 3:54 by DDRKirby(ISQ) (video)
Hard Mode, no continues - 3:38 by DDRKirby(ISQ)
Also see a former Hard Mode, no continues record video - 3:46 by DDRKirby(ISQ)
